Post.title: termuxhexo2
Post._content:
# GitHub

# GitHub
GitHub.github.io
### ssh ~~~~

<!-- more -->
`git config --global user.name ""
git config --global user.email "GitHub"`
ssh
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C ""
`ls`.ssh
GitHubSSH and GPG keyskeyid_rsa.pub.ssh

`ssh -T git@github.com`
### GitHub
_config.yml
`deploy:`
  `type: git`
  `repo: https://github.com//.github.io.git`
  `branch: master`
deploy-git GitHub
`npm install hexo-deployer-git --save`

`hexo clean`
`hexo generate`
`hexo deploy`
`http://.github.io`
### 
hexo cleanhexo generatehexo ghexo deployGitHubhexo d
deployOK
